gw.api.domain

Interface Clause

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClauseAbstractMethods
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Clause, Coverage, Exclusion, PolicyCondition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BAHiredSpecPerilCov, BASpecCausesLossCov, BAStateCond, BAStateCov, BAStateExcl, BOPBuildingCov, BOPLocationCov, BusinessAutoCond, BusinessAutoCov, BusinessAutoExcl, BusinessOwnersCond, BusinessOwnersCov, BusinessOwnersExcl, BusinessVehicleCov, CommercialPropertyCond, CommercialPropertyCov, CommercialPropertyExcl, ContractorsEquipCov, ContrEquipPartCond, ContrEquipPartCov, ContrEquipPartExcl, CPBlanketCov, CPBuildingCov, CPLocationCov, GeneralLiabilityCond, GeneralLiabilityCov, GeneralLiabilityExcl, GLLineSchCovItemCov, GLLineScheduleCond, GLLineScheduleCov, GLLineScheduleExcl, HOPCoveragePartCond, HOPCoveragePartCov, HOPCoveragePartExcl, HOPCovPartSchCondItemCond, HOPCovPartSchCovItemCov, HOPCovPartScheduleCond, HOPCovPartScheduleCov, HOPCovPartScheduleExcl, HOPCovPartSchExclItemExcl, HOPDwellingCond, HOPDwellingCov, HOPDwellingExcl, HOPDwellingScheduleCond, HOPDwellingScheduleCov, HOPDwellingScheduleExcl, HOPDwellSchCondItemCond, HOPDwellSchCovItemCov, HOPDwellSchExclItemExcl, HOPLineCond, HOPLineCov, HOPLineExcl, HOPLineSchCondItemCond, HOPLineSchCovItemCov, HOPLineScheduleCond, HOPLineScheduleCov, HOPLineScheduleExcl, HOPLineSchExclItemExcl, IMAccountsRecCov, IMAccountsRecPartCond, IMAccountsRecPartCov, IMAccountsRecPartExcl, IMSignCov, PersonalAutoCond, PersonalAutoCov, PersonalAutoExcl, PersonalVehicleCov, WCStateCov, WorkersCompCond, WorkersCompCov, WorkersCompExcl

    public interface Clause
extends ClauseAbstractMethods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearReferenceDateInternal()
      Sets the ReferenceDateInternal field of this clause to null so getReferenceDate() will compute the reference date based on the current policy data, rather than returning the field's value.
      void denormalizeReferenceDate()
      Stores the current value of getReferenceDate() in the ReferenceDateInternal field of this clause if the field is not already set, and does nothing otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • getPattern

        ClausePattern getPattern()
        Returns:
        the ClausePattern associated with this Clause.

      • getCovTerm

        CovTerm getCovTerm(CovTermPattern pattern)
        Returns the CovTerm in this clause with the given pattern. Note that this may return null if the CovTerm is not available due to the state of the policy, and a hasCovTerm check or null test may be necessary to avoid an NPE.
        Parameters:
        pattern - - pattern of the term you want to get
        Returns:
        the term

      • getCovTerm

        @Deprecated
CovTerm getCovTerm(java.lang.String patternCode)
        Deprecated. Since PolicyCenter 9.0.0. Please use getCovTermByPublicId(String) or getCovTermByCodeIdentifier(String) instead.
        Returns the CovTerm in this coverage with the given pattern. Note that this may return null if the CovTerm is not available due to the state of the policy, and a hasCovTerm check or null test may be necessary to avoid an NPE.
        Parameters:
        patternCode - - pattern code of the term you want to get
        Returns:
        the term

      • getCovTermByCodeIdentifier

        CovTerm getCovTermByCodeIdentifier(java.lang.String patternCodeIdentifier)
        Returns the CovTerm in this coverage with the given pattern. Note that this may return null if the CovTerm is not available due to the state of the policy, and a hasCovTerm check or null test may be necessary to avoid an NPE.
        Parameters:
        patternCodeIdentifier - codeIdentifier of the term you want to get
        Returns:
        the term

      • getCovTermByPublicId

        CovTerm getCovTermByPublicId(java.lang.String patternPublicId)
        Returns the CovTerm in this coverage with the given pattern. Note that this may return null if the CovTerm is not available due to the state of the policy, and a hasCovTerm check or null test may be necessary to avoid an NPE.
        Parameters:
        patternPublicId - publicId of the term you want to get
        Returns:
        the term

      • getBean

        EffDated getBean()
        Returns:
        the actual bean this clause represents

      • getReferenceDate

        java.util.Date getReferenceDate()
        Invokes IReferenceDatePlugin to compute the reference date of this clause.
        Returns:
        the reference date

      • denormalizeReferenceDate

        void denormalizeReferenceDate()
        Stores the current value of getReferenceDate() in the ReferenceDateInternal field of this clause if the field is not already set, and does nothing otherwise. This is meant to be called only upon binding a policy period.

      • clearReferenceDateInternal

        void clearReferenceDateInternal()
        Sets the ReferenceDateInternal field of this clause to null so getReferenceDate() will compute the reference date based on the current policy data, rather than returning the field's value. This is meant to be called only upon creating a new policy term (e.g., in a renewal job), when the reference dates must be recalculated.

      • getCovTerms

        CovTerm[] getCovTerms()
        Returns:
        an array containing the child CovTerms of this Clause

      • hasCovTerm

        boolean hasCovTerm(CovTermPattern pattern)
        Returns true if the clause has a covterm of the specified type and returns false otherwise
        Parameters:
        pattern - the specific pattern to search for
        Returns:
        true if there is a matching covterm, false otherwise

      • hasCovTerm

        @Deprecated
boolean hasCovTerm(java.lang.String patternCode)
        Deprecated. Since PolicyCenter 9.0.0. Please use hasCovTermByPublicId(String) or hasCovTermByCodeIdentifier(String) instead.
        Like hasCovTerm(gw.api.productmodel.CovTermPattern) but takes a String code instead of a pattern
        Parameters:
        patternCode - String patterncode to match against
        Returns:
        true if this Clause has a matching CovTerm, false otherwise

      • hasCovTermByPublicId

        boolean hasCovTermByPublicId(java.lang.String patternPublicId)
        Like hasCovTerm(gw.api.productmodel.CovTermPattern) but takes a String publicId instead of a pattern
        Parameters:
        patternPublicId - string publicId to match against
        Returns:
        true if this Clause has a matching CovTerm, false otherwise

      • hasCovTermByCodeIdentifier

        boolean hasCovTermByCodeIdentifier(java.lang.String patternCodeIdentifier)
        Like hasCovTerm(gw.api.productmodel.CovTermPattern) but takes a String publicId instead of a pattern
        Parameters:
        patternCodeIdentifier - string codeIdentifier to match against
        Returns:
        true if this Clause has a matching CovTerm, false otherwise

        Returns:
